request.description: Create a new category. Set parentId to null for top-level categories, or provide parentId to create a subcategory.
Get all top-level categories with nested child categories recursively. Returns Women, Men, Kids, Brands with their complete nested structure.
Get a single category by ID with nested child categories recursively, parent category, and associated products (limited to 10).
Update a category. All fields are optional. You can update name, slug, and/or parentId.
Delete a category. Cannot delete if category has child categories or associated products.

response.name: Success Response
Conflict - Has Children
